changelog.title: House Progress Panel
changelog.description: Each house now displays your personal learning progress with completion percentage and next module.

changelog.title: Visual Progress Bar
changelog.description: See your house mastery at a glance with animated progress bars showing modules completed.

changelog.title: Continue Learning
changelog.description: One-click access to your next recommended module based on the learning path sequence.

changelog.title: Time Estimates
changelog.description: See estimated time remaining to complete each house based on remaining modules.
